Description: This 3 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom unit is located on the first level of a two family brick house. Unit features stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops with brand new black splash, new bathroom vanities, medicine cabinets and new kitchen flooring. Building is located just minutes from Boston College, Green Line T as well as several shops, stores and restaurants. Oil heat and hot water. We are pet friendly, Cats $150/month and Dogs $200/month upon landlords approval.
